recipe.title: Butterscotch Self saucing pudding.
recipe.ingredients: 1 C Self-Raising Flour 3/4 C Sugar Pinch of Salt 60 g Butter 1 1/2 C Milk
recipe.steps: Sift Dry ingredients into Bowl Melt Butter and add to flour etc with milk. Mix thoroughly and pour into well sprayed dish. Combine syrup, butter and hot water and pour over dish Cook at 180C for 40-45 minutes.
